verses.verse: And when <S%G3753><s%> they drew near <S%G1448><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and were come <S%G2064><s%> to Bethphage, <S%G967><s%> to the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, Go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> over <S%G561><s%> against <S%G561><s%> you, and straightway <S%G2112><s%> you shall find <S%G2147><s%> an ass <S%G3688><s%> tied, <S%G1210><s%> and a colt <S%G4454><s%> with her: loose <S%G3089><s%> them, and bring <S%G71><s%> them to me.

And if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man say <S%G2036><s%> ought <S%G5100><s%> to you, you shall say, <S%G2046><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of them; and straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> them.
All <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done, <S%G1096><s%> that it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> by the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Tell <S%G2036><s%> you the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Sion, <S%G4622><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your King <S%G935><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to you, meek, <S%G4239><s%> and sitting <S%G1910><s%> on an ass, <S%G3688><s%> and a colt <S%G4454><s%> the foal <S%G5207><s%> of an ass. <S%G5268><s%>
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went, <S%G4198><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%> them,

And brought <S%G71><s%> the ass, <S%G3688><s%> and the colt, <S%G4454><s%> and put <S%G2007><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> them their clothes, <S%G2440><s%> and they set <S%G1940><s%> him thereon. <S%G1883><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And a very <S%G4118><s%> great <S%G4118><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> in the way; <S%G3598><s%> others <S%G243><s%> cut <S%G2875><s%> down <S%G2875><s%> branches <S%G2798><s%> from the trees, <S%G1186><s%> and strewed <S%G4766><s%> them in the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> that went <S%G4254><s%> before, <S%G4254><s%> and that followed, <S%G190><s%> cried, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the son <S%G5207><s%> of David: <S%G1138><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in the highest. <S%G5310><s%>

And when he was come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was moved, <S%G4579><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is this? <S%G3778><s%>
And the multitude <S%G3793><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> out all <S%G3956><s%> them that sold <S%G4453><s%> and bought <S%G59><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the moneychangers, <S%G2855><s%> and the seats <S%G2515><s%> of them that sold <S%G4453><s%> doves, <S%G4058><s%>

And said <S%G3004><s%> to them, It is written, <S%G1125><s%> My house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer; <S%G4335><s%> but you have made <S%G4160><s%> it a den <S%G4693><s%> of thieves. <S%G3027><s%>
And the blind <S%G5185><s%> and the lame <S%G5560><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him in the temple; <S%G2411><s%> and he healed <S%G2323><s%> them.

And when the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes <S%G1122><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the wonderful <S%G2297><s%> things that he did, <S%G4160><s%> and the children <S%G3816><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the son <S%G5207><s%> of David; <S%G1138><s%> they were sore <S%G23><s%> displeased, <S%G23><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Hear <S%G191><s%> you what <S%G5101><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> say? <S%G3004><s%> And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Yes; <S%G3483><s%> have you never <S%G3763><s%> read, <S%G314><s%> Out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of babes <S%G3516><s%> and sucklings <S%G2337><s%> you have perfected <S%G2675><s%> praise? <S%G136><s%>
And he left <S%G2641><s%> them, and went <S%G1831><s%> out of the city <S%G4172><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Bethany; <S%G963><s%> and he lodged <S%G835><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> in the morning <S%G4405><s%> as he returned <S%G1877><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> he hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

And when he saw <S%G1492><s%> a fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> in the way, <S%G3598><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to it, and found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> thereon, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> but leaves <S%G5444><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to it, Let no <S%G3371><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> grow <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> you henceforward <S%G3371><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> And presently <S%G3916><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> withered <S%G3583><s%> away.

And when the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, they marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> soon <S%G3916><s%> is the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> withered <S%G3583><s%> away!

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, If <S%G1437><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and doubt <S%G1252><s%> not, you shall not only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> which is done to the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> but also <S%G2579><s%> if <S%G2579><s%> you shall say <S%G2036><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> Be you removed, <S%G142><s%> and be you cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea; <S%G2281><s%> it shall be done. <S%G1096><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> things, whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> you shall ask <S%G154><s%> in prayer, <S%G4335><s%> believing, <S%G4100><s%> you shall receive. <S%G2983><s%>

And when he was come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him as he was teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> By what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> you these <S%G5023><s%> things? and who <S%G5101><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> you this <S%G5026><s%> authority? <S%G1849><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I also <S%G2504><s%> will ask <S%G2065><s%> you one <S%G1520><s%> thing, <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you tell <S%G2036><s%> me, I in like <S%G2504><s%> wise will tell <S%G2046><s%> you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things.

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> was it? from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of men? <S%G444><s%> And they reasoned <S%G1260><s%> with themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> we shall say, <S%G2036><s%> From heaven; <S%G3772><s%> he will say <S%G2046><s%> to us, Why <S%G1302><s%> did you not then <S%G3767><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him?

But if <S%G1437><s%> we shall say, <S%G2036><s%> Of men; <S%G444><s%> we fear <S%G5399><s%> the people; <S%G3793><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> hold <S%G2192><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> as a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

And they answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> We cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> tell. <S%G1492><s%> And he said <S%G5346><s%> to them, Neither <S%G3761><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> I you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things.

But what <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> you? A certain man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons; <S%G5043><s%> and he came <S%G4334><s%> to the first, <S%G4413><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Son, <S%G5043><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> to day <S%G4594><s%> in my vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> not: but afterward <S%G5305><s%> he repented, <S%G3338><s%> and went. <S%G565><s%>

And he came <S%G4334><s%> to the second, <S%G1208><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> likewise. <S%G5615><s%> And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> I go, <S%G565><s%> sir: <S%G2962><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> not.

Whether <S%G5101><s%> of them two <S%G1417><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of his father? <S%G3962><s%> They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, The first. <S%G4413><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and the harlots <S%G4204><s%> go <S%G4254><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you.

For John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to you in the way <S%G3598><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and you believed <S%G4100><s%> him not: but the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and the harlots <S%G4204><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> him: and you, when you had seen <S%G1492><s%> it, repented <S%G3338><s%> not afterward, <S%G5305><s%> that you might believe <S%G4100><s%> him.

Hear <S%G191><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable: <S%G3850><s%> There was a certain <S%G444><s%> <S%G5100><s%> householder, <S%G3617><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and hedged <S%G5418><s%> <S%G4060><s%> it round about, <S%G4060><s%> and dig <S%G3736><s%> a wine press <S%G3025><s%> in it, and built <S%G3618><s%> a tower, <S%G4444><s%> and let <S%G1554><s%> it out to farmers, <S%G1092><s%> and went <S%G589><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far country: <S%G589><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of the fruit <S%G2590><s%> drew near, <S%G1448><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> his servants <S%G1401><s%> to the farmers, <S%G1092><s%> that they might receive <S%G2983><s%> the fruits <S%G2590><s%> of it.

And the farmers <S%G1092><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> his servants, <S%G1401><s%> and beat <S%G1194><s%> one, <S%G3739><s%> and killed <S%G615><s%> another, <S%G3739><s%> and stoned <S%G3036><s%> another. <S%G3739><s%>
Again, <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> other <S%G243><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than the first: <S%G4413><s%> and they did <S%G4160><s%> to them likewise. <S%G5615><s%>
But last <S%G5305><s%> of all he sent <S%G649><s%> to them his son, <S%G5207><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> They will reverence <S%G1788><s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>

But when the farmers <S%G1092><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the son, <S%G5207><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the heir; <S%G2818><s%> come, <S%G1205><s%> let us kill <S%G615><s%> him, and let us seize <S%G2722><s%> on his inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>
And they caught <S%G2983><s%> him, and cast <S%G1544><s%> him out of the vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and slew <S%G615><s%> him.

When <S%G3752><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will he do <S%G4160><s%> to those <S%G1565><s%> farmers? <S%G1092><s%>

They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, He will miserably <S%G2560><s%> destroy <S%G622><s%> those <S%G846><s%> wicked <S%G2556><s%> men, and will let <S%G1554><s%> out his vineyard <S%G290><s%> to other <S%G243><s%> farmers, <S%G1092><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall render <S%G591><s%> him the fruits <S%G2590><s%> in their seasons. <S%G2540><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Did you never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> in the scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> The stone <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the builders <S%G3618><s%> rejected, <S%G593><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> is become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the corner: <S%G1137><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> doing, <S%G1096><s%> and it is marvelous <S%G2298><s%> in our eyes? <S%G3788><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> I to you, The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> from you, and given <S%G1325><s%> to a nation <S%G1484><s%> bringing <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> the fruits <S%G2590><s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>

And whoever <S%G3588><s%> shall fall <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> shall be broken: <S%G4917><s%> but on <S%G1909><s%> whomsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> it shall fall, <S%G4098><s%> it will grind <S%G3039><s%> him to powder. <S%G3039><s%>
And when the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> his parables, <S%G3850><s%> they perceived <S%G1097><s%> that he spoke <S%G3004><s%> of them.

But when they sought <S%G2212><s%> to lay hands <S%G2902><s%> on him, they feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G1894><s%> they took <S%G2192><s%> him for a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>
